title: Looking for Competitive team Plat+
body:
Hello everyone, I am an ADC main, and was wondering if there was any teams out there for me to try out for!

It would be greatly appreciated if you get back to me everyone :)

Age: 17
Role: ADC / JG
pool: Ezreal, Lucian, Vayne, Kog'Maw , Twitch
JG - Lee Sin, Vi, Ivern

replies.body: Shoot me a message in client
